title: Rachel; Just one of the kids
creator_credit: Tony Paice and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
brief_description: 1. “Rachel” (40 min.) is the story of a young girl with a disability making her transition from a small rural community school to a large country technical school. 2. “Just one of the kids” (20 min.) shows the development of integration in the state school system.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Paice and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
